amendatorysection.catchline: Disciplinary actions; evidence of discipline by another state or jurisdiction.
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of subdivision (11) of section 38-178, a certified copy of the record of denial, refusal of renewal, limitation, suspension, or revocation of a license, certificate, registration, or other similar credential or the taking of other disciplinary measures against it by another state or jurisdiction shall be conclusive evidence of a violation.
